title: Mother Sheltered With 14-Month-Old as Their Kibbutz Was Attacked
description: In their home’s safe room, Sarit Kurtzman, her husband and their 14-month-old daughter waited out the attack.

title: Tuesday Briefing: Israel Orders a ‘Siege’ of Gaza
description: Plus can betting save the world?

title: How Hamas Took 150 Israelis Hostage
description: Palestinian militants kidnapped scores of Israelis in an unprecedented attack that took the Israeli-Palestinian conflict into unknown territory. Their relatives recount how they were captured.

title: Israel Orders ‘Complete Siege’ of Gaza and Mobilizes 300,000 Reservists
description: The troop mobilization comes amid signs that Israel could be preparing for a major ground invasion of Gaza. Israeli planes bombed hundreds of sites, including mosques and a marketplace.

title: Lost in Tibetan Avalanches, 2 American Women Close to a Record
description: The mountaineers, who hoped to become the first American women to scale the world’s 14 tallest peaks, were among climbers struck by avalanches on Mount Shishapangma. One was 80 meters short of her goal, her mother said.

title: What to Know About the Hostages Taken From Israel by Hamas
description: At least 150 Israelis were taken hostage by Hamas fighters, according to an initial assessment. Officials from the U.S. and other countries are determining if their citizens are among the captives.

title: Hamas Attack Strips Away Notion It Could Be a Force for Stability in Gaza
description: Israel had considered Hamas a terrorist organization but one that could help govern the Gaza Strip, which the group controls. Now, senior Israeli officials say, Hamas must be crushed.

title: For Israelis, Scale of Tragedy Starts to Set In
description: The feeling of shock among Israelis over the attack by Hamas and the obvious intelligence failure that allowed it to happen is compounding the fear of what might yet be to come.

title: Israeli Airstrike Hits a Marketplace in Gaza, Killing Dozens
description: Sixty people died in the strike in the Jabaliya refugee camp, a rescue worker said. There was no immediate confirmation from the Gazan Health Ministry.

title: National Gallery of Canada Decolonizes Amid Turmoil
description: As Canada reckons with its colonial history, a push to “decolonize” museums has rocked its National Gallery and other museums.

title: Hamburg Airport Suspends Flights Over Threat to Iranian Plane
description: All fights were suspended for more than an hour, but after what security officials said was a vigorous search, the airport reopened.

title: Xi-Schumer Meeting Raises Hopes of Smoother U.S.-China Relations
description: Mr. Xi said there were “1,000 reasons” to make the relationship work. Earlier, the Senate majority leader had criticized Beijing for its response to the attack by Hamas in Israel.

title: Yellen May Face Questions in Morocco Over U.S. Dysfunction
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen calls on Congress to authorize more economic support for Ukraine.

title: Israel-Gaza War: Israel Orders ‘Complete Siege’ of Gaza as Troops Battle to Secure Border Areas
description: Israel’s defense minister said the authorities would block deliveries of food, water and fuel into the Gaza Strip. Israeli troops were still fighting Palestinian militants in border areas, two days after an invasion that has left hundreds dead.

title: Israeli Father Tells of Moment His Children Were Kidnapped
description: Yoni Asher says his wife and two daughters, ages 5 and 3, were kidnapped from an Israeli border town by gunmen on Saturday and taken to Gaza.

title: Across the Mideast, a Surge of Support for Palestinians as War Erupts in Gaza
description: The escalation laid bare the limitations of diplomatic deals between Israel and Arab governments as long as the underlying conflict continues. “We told you so,” a Saudi scholar said.

title: What to Know as the U.K. Appeals a Ruling on Its Asylum Policy
description: Britain’s Supreme Court determined earlier this year that the Conservative government’s plan to deport asylum seekers to Rwanda was unlawful.

title: Former Israeli Military Spokesman Paints Grim Picture of Fighting
description: Lt. Col. Jonathan Conricus called the situation “dire” on Sunday and said that the military had sent at least 100,000 reservists to southern Israel near the border with Gaza.

title: Monday Briefing
description: The Hamas-Israel war has entered a new phase.

title: Hamas Attack Raises Questions Over an Israeli Intelligence Failure
description: American and Israeli officials said none of Israel’s intelligence services had specific warning that Hamas was preparing a sophisticated assault.

title: U.S. Continues Push for Saudi-Israel Ties Even After Hamas Assault
description: As Israel prepares an offensive in Gaza, President Biden and his aides are gauging whether Saudi officials remain interested in opening up diplomatic relations.
